# Abstract / Key Points

<img src="Screenshot 2023-05-22 at 12.41.58 PM.png" width=80%>

Basic rel processes: 

  - inter- and intrapersonal adaptive processes (pos and neg interactions, commitment), 
  - stressors ($)  
  - Enduring vulnerability (psych distress)

The associations between these constructs and rel satis were not moderated by income 

N = 927; Age = 18—34; co-habitating married and unmarried couples
